translations: n.顶点；[昆] 头顶；[天] 天顶

sentences.sentence: In this architecture, all data for each vertex must be available at the same time.
sentences.translation: 在这一架构中，来自各顶点的所有数据都必须同时可用。

sentences.sentence: Because one vertex can only have one normal, you must duplicate the vertices as well.
sentences.translation: 由于一个顶点只能有一条法线，所以你还要复制顶点。

sentences.sentence: In the first feasible region above, the optimal solution is the right vertex of the solution space.
sentences.translation: 在上面的第一个可行域中，优化解决方案是解析空间中的右顶点。
